entries.gave_resource: I'll make sure this is put to good use.  We're keeping track of who brings us resources you know.  It's better to give them to the crafters rather than giving them to me.  But I'll make sure you get credit for this one.  As soon as I get some free time.
entries.no_skill: I'm sorry, but I'm looking for someone who is skilled in sampling for resources.  My intelligence reports tell me that you don't have that particular skill.
entries.special_answer_3: That's right.  I'm modifying your survey tools so that when you find the spots with the resources I need you'll also be able to detect and sample some special resources that we require.  Ostrine, Endrine, Wind Crystals, Rudic, and Ardanium II.  They're specific metals and energy types that will aid us in creating our village defenses.  You can bring them back to me, or if you have friends who are crafters you let them use the resources to make better defenses for us.  If you'll help us I can show you how to use your force powers to make yourself more, well, I guess lucky would be the proper term.  Can you help?
entries.special_answer_2: That's right.  I'm modifying your survey tools so that when you find the spots with the resources I need you'll also be able to detect and sample some special resources that we require.  Ostrine, Endrine, Wind Crystals, Rudic, and Ardanium II.  They're specific metals and energy types that will aid us in creating our village defenses.  You can bring them back to me, but even better would be to give them to your friends who are crafters so they can use the resources to make better defenses for us.  Now, at this point, if you're ready to help us, I will promise to teach you to use your force powers to survey.  What do you say?
entries.youre_busy: I'm sorry, but according to the rumor mill here in the village you already have something to do.  Come back and see me when you have more free time.
entries.special_answer: That's right.  I'm modifying your survey tools so that when you find the spots with the resources I need you'll also be able to detect and sample some special resources that we require.  Ostrine, Endrine, Wind Crystals, Rudic, and Ardanium II.  They're specific metals and energy types that will aid us in creating our village defenses.  You can bring them back to me, or if you have friends who are crafters you let them use the resources to make better defenses for us.  Now, at this point, are you ready to help us?
entries.last_piece: There is one more thing.  If you're going to work for me you're not going to be able to help out any of the other villagers while you do it.  This is a commitment.  I need someone focused on finding me the best places to harvest resources.  I also need you to look for some special resources for me.
entries.sure: Yeah, I know how to survey.  Anything else I need to know?
entries.explanation: We need resources.  Resources that will allow us to better the defenses of our village here.  I don't need you to actually bring me the resources, I have a team for that.  I just need you to find me the best places to set up our harvesting.  I need your surveying skills, and your ability to survive outside this village.  It's dangerous out there, and some of the villagers just aren't up to it.  The resources we need may not even be on Dathomir, they could be on any planet.  Can you help us?
entries.explain: What is it you want me to do?
entries.thanks: I want to thank you for all your help.  I see you got your new survey tool.  You can use it just like any other survey tool, only it has a modified chip that will allow you to scan for any type of inorganic resource.  It will find energy, gas, ore, chemicals, you name it.  You may want to speak with Noldan who can train you in any of the new skills you're interested in learning about.
entries.wrong_phase: There's not really anything I need right now.  Perhaps you should talk to some of the other villagers and see if they need your help.
entries.sample_for_gas: I need you to find an area where we can survey Gas.  It should have at least a 50% density.
entries.sample_for_energy: I need you to find an area where we can survey Wind or Solar Energy.  It should have at least a 50% density.
entries.sample_for_steel: I need you to find an area where we can survey Steel.  It should have at least a 50% density.
entries.sample_for_copper: I need you to find an area where we can survey Copper.  It should have at least a 50% density.
entries.sample_for_gemstone: I need you to find an area where we can survey Gemstone.  It should have at least a 50% density.
entries.sample_for_ore: I need you to find an area where we can survey Ore.  It should have at least a 50% density.
entries.sample_for_aluminum: I need you to find an area where we can survey Aluminum.  It should have at least a 50% density. Once you get there, take a sample and try to find some special resources. When you've done that, check your journal; it should tell you what to look for next.
entries.sample_for_iron: I need you to find an area where we can survey Iron.  It should have at least a 50% density.  Once you get there, take a sample and try to find some special resources. When you've done that, check your journal; it should tell you what to look for next.
entries.type_six_1:
Your next task is to find a 70% deposit of Aluminum.

Remember to Sample when you find the spot, in order to check for special resources.

entries.sample_for_type_six: A very important part of the crafting process for the villages defenses requires a metal that is easily molded to our task.  Aluminum!  That's what we need.  I need you to find me an area that contains a 70% deposit of aluminum.
entries.sample_for_type_five: All the plating and wiring we're going to be doing is going to require copper, and lots of it.  Do you think you can find copper?  I know that you can.  A 70% deposit please.  That's what will get us up and running.  Copper.
entries.sample_for_type_four: We need steel.  We can't get enough of it.  As soon as we get more we burn through it.  Steel.  70% deposits of steel are hard to find, but I know you can do it.  That's what I need.  Steel.
entries.sample_for_type_three: Do you know what we need?  We need Iron!  Iron is the foundation.  The base.  What we need for all our hard work.  The defenses must have Iron!  Find me a deposit of Iron that is at least at the 70% mark.  That's what I need.
entries.sample_for_type_two: Energy!  We need power to operate our tools and equipment.  Not to mention the generators as well.  Hm.  Yes.  I need you to bring me energy.  Any kind will do!  As long as you find a 70% or higher deposit.
entries.this_much: Let me see, ah yes, I have the records right here...
entries.too_bad: I'm so sorry to hear that.  I was rather hoping you could get this done.  I'm not sure who else I can get to help me out.
entries.sample_for_type_one: A very important part of the crafting process for the villages defenses requires a metal that is easily molded to our task.  Aluminum!  That's what we need.  I need you to find me an area that contains a 70% deposit of aluminum.
entries.how_much: Can you tell me where I stand on bringing you resources?
entries.no_task: Sorry, I'm not interested right now.
entries.want_task: Hello!  Good tidings and all that.  There's some work I need done, and I need someone to do it.  You look like the kind of person who could take on such a task.  Could you?  Would you?  Are you interested in helping with my work?
